alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 3:19AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS THIS MORNING... A line of snow showers were occurring along and ahead of a cold front this morning from near Ely south through the Twin Ports to the St. Croix River Valley as of 320 AM. The line was moving east east. The snow will quickly reduce the visibility to a half to one mile for 5 to 15 minutes. Snow amounts will be light. In addition to the snow will be gusty west to northwest winds. If you`re traveling this morning, give yourself some extra time and be prepared for quickly changing conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
